rows.label: tlk400901_msg0001
rows.name: Oh? Isn't it Periperi-san?

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0002
rows.name:
Kyaa! Rex! What a coincidence
meeting you here, mo!

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0003
rows.name:
Periperi-san, you haven't brought
any cargo from Gula, have you?

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0004
rows.name: I have, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0005
rows.name: Even though you were in Avaritia?

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0006
rows.name:
I carry cargo from Avaritia to Gula,
and from Gula to Superbia, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0007
rows.name: I see, so that's how it is.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0008
rows.name:
Then Tora has a question
for Periperi-san, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0009
rows.name:
Did you recently transport a large
amount of Bion Connectors, mo?

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0010
rows.name:
Momomo... If I talk about such
things, I'll get in trouble for
leaking confidential information, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0011
rows.name: Please, somehow... I'm begging you.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0012
rows.name:
Kyaa! If Rex asks, I'll
do anything for you, mo!

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0013
rows.name:
I transported the Bion Connectors
in yellow barrels, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0014
rows.name: How many, mo?

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0015
rows.name: I think there were ten, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0016
rows.name: That must be it.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0017
rows.name: Do you know where they were going, mo?

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0018
rows.name:
Unfortunately, Periperi doesn't
know, mo. My job is just to
bring them to this port, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0019
rows.name:
But the cargo unloaded here
is supposed to be transported
to the city, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0020
rows.name:
They might be at the inspection point
near the elevator, mo. But only if no
one has picked them up yet, mo.

rows.label: tlk400901_msg0021
rows.name:
Alright, let's go take a
look. Thanks, Periperi-san.
